nodes.text: The Battle of Sarrish took place on the planet Sarrish during the second year of the Clone Wars. It was one of the Galactic Republic's most devastating defeats, with many clone troopers perishing in the battle. One of the survivors, Clone Captain CC-5576-39 "Gregor," was reported missing, although a Republic team discovered that he had ended up on a transport that crashed on the remote world of Abafar.
The Battle of Sarrish was created as the story for Routine Valor, a single-issue comic book published by Dark Horse Comics on May 6, 2006 for the annual Free Comic Book Day.
